content: this legal text explains the progress of a divorce settlement between two parties referred to as the leaving party and the acquirer it states that the parties were married in december 2003 and owned several properties together the document explains the origin of ownership of these properties including previous owners and transfers as well as the mortgage situation and responsibility for repayment the acquirer will take over the properties and indemnify the leaving party other aspects such as utilities insurance and liabilities are also covered the document mentions the division of assets and the settlement amount of eur 427000 which will be paid in three installments the parties declare that they have no further claims against each other except for any amounts still due according to the settlement the notary confirms the payment of eur 400000 as part of the overall arrangement the document also clarifies the terms regarding an individual pension commitment and an insurance policy it states that the surviving party is involved in a temporary association and has not disposed of a building within the past five years for tax purposes the notary confirms this and explains the consequences the text also mentions the dismissal of a registration the requirement for the parties to provide their address for service and the provision of copies of the deed the notary confirms the identity of the parties and their obligations the text concludes with the confirmation of payment of fees and the signing of the deed
